text:
@AFRSControl @PHE_uk @BristolCouncil @EnvAgencySW @bristolportpol @ASPolice Thank you for your prompt response to my query..
It's very reassuring to know that you managed to contain the risk from this blaze to social media users only and that the wider population had nothing to fear. 
Keep up the excellent work.
#heroesinheadsets #staysafe #teamwork
